items.value: Kelly is waiting for a Special Fish Delivery!

Interested on a freaky special fish delivery!?

Order:
2x Donut Fish

You may can fish it at the pond! (Park)
You cant use Worms to catch it, you will need Donuts!
That is crazy i know but it works, trust me.
I will pay you for this delivery!
yes Kelly, i have the freaky Fish with me!

Wonderful like last time!
Thank you again, please take this Earthworms and the filled Wallets.

You got:
5x Earthworm
2 x filled Wallet
Thanks and see you soon Kelly!

Um ...?

I need the Fish for the Customer!!!!.
Only with the Fish we can continue...

Required:
2x Donut Fish
